title: Experimental Officer, Manager of Electron Microscopy Facility (EMF)
text:
The Centre for Core Biotechnology Services (CBS) 
Open ended contract 
At Leicester we’re going places. As a leading University in Britain our aim is to climb further. A commitment to high quality fused with an inclusive academic culture is our hallmark and led the Times Higher Education to describe us as “elite without being elitist”. 
In this position you will be responsible for the management, planning and running of the Electron Microscopy Facility within CBS. You will also be responsible for managing the provision of an effective advanced technical services for both research and teaching, provide training of researchers, and administrative aspects of the Facility. Supervision, training and development of supporting technician. 
You will have well-developed working knowledge of Electron Microscopy and biological sciences practices and procedures as well as previous practical experience, and understanding of electron microscopy techniques and applications 
Informal enquiries are welcome and should be made to Ila Patel on mjb42@le.ac.uk
